item.title: 押注英国利率将继续走高，英镑升至 1.30 美元
item.description: 英镑自 11 月以来首次升至 1.30 美元以上，因为人们押注英国今年的利率将保持在主要同类国家之上。【原文：The pound rose above $1.30 for the first time since November on bets interest rates in the UK will stay above those of its main peers this year.】

item.title: 韩国央行成员更加关注巩固经济势头
item.description: 根据上个月的会议记录，韩国央行董事会成员表示，韩国经济面临一系列风险，包括唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）的关税、消费低迷和出口势头减弱，韩国央行需要集中精力支撑经济。【原文：The Bank of Korea needs to focus on shoring up an economy that faces a range of risks including Donald Trump’s tariffs, a consumption slump and weakening export momentum, board members said, according to minutes of their meeting last month.】

item.title: 瑞士法郎期权活动激增，交易者押注更多损失
item.description: 在瑞士法郎期权历史上最繁忙的一天，交易员们大举押注瑞士法郎将扩大近期跌幅。【原文：In one of the busiest days in history for Swiss franc options, traders bet big that the currency will extend its recent losses.】

item.title: 德国债券在释放国防开支投票前下跌
item.description: 在德国议会就一项历史性的支出方案进行投票之前，德国债券下跌，该方案将为欧洲最大的经济体在国防和基础设施方面支出数千亿欧元敞开大门。【原文：German bonds fell ahead of the nation’s parliamentary vote on a historic spending package that will open the door for Europe’s largest economy to spend hundreds of billions of euros in defense and infrastructure.】

item.title: 泛欧交易所认为资金在美国反思消费问题之际流向欧洲
item.description: 泛欧交易所（Euronext NV）首席执行官Stephane Boujnah表示，在政府支出增加的前景下，以及在投资者重新评估美国市场的情况下，越来越多的投资者将资金转移到欧洲。【原文：Euronext NV Chief Executive Officer Stephane Boujnah said investors are increasingly moving money to Europe amid prospects for higher government spending and as investors reevaluate the US markets.】

item.title: 南非最新银行力争在三年内实现收支平衡
item.description: 南非银行业竞争激烈，最新加入者的目标是在 2028 年实现收支平衡。【原文：The latest entrant in South Africa’s crowded banking sector aims to break even in 2028.】

item.title: 腾讯推出开源人工智能模型，将文字转化为 3D 视觉效果
item.description: 腾讯控股有限公司（Tencent Holdings Ltd.）发布了可将文本或图像转化为三维视觉效果和图形的新人工智能服务，这是自 DeepSeek 激发中国和美国人工智能发展以来，大型科技公司推出的一系列产品中的最新产品。【原文：Tencent Holdings Ltd. released new AI services that turn text or images into 3D visuals and graphics, the latest in a series of products to emerge from big tech firms since DeepSeek galvanized Chinese and US artificial intelligence development.】

item.title: 日本贸易振兴机构称，特朗普关税将提高投资美国的门槛
item.description: 日本贸易振兴机构（Japan External Trade Organization）主席表示，唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）总统的关税运动很可能会加剧通货膨胀，并提高日本公司在美国投资的门槛，从而违背总统吸引投资和振兴美国制造业的目标。【原文：President Donald Trump’s tariff campaign is likely to worsen inflation and raise the bar for Japanese companies to invest in the US, defying the president’s aim to lure investment and revive American manufacturing, according to the chair of the Japan External Trade Organization.】

item.title: 印尼称财政部长辞职报道为 "骗局
item.description: 印度尼西亚否认了有关财政部长斯里-穆利亚尼-英德拉瓦蒂（Sri Mulyani Indrawati）的报道。【原文：Indonesia has denied reports that Finance Minister Sri Mulyani Indrawati, a veteran whose departure could deepen turmoil that has stocks on course for their biggest fall in more than a decade.】

item.title: 富时 100 指数直播：英国股市将迎来第五个上涨日
特朗普赢得大选后，瑞士央行暂缓外汇干预措施
item.description: 在 2024 年的最后三个月里，瑞士国家银行在很大程度上没有介入货币市场，这标志着一整年没有对瑞士法郎进行大规模干预，因为官员们把重点放在了利率上，以引导货币条件。【原文：The Swiss National Bank largely kept out of currency markets in the final three months of 2024, marking a full year without sizeable interventions in the franc as officials focused on interest rates to steer monetary conditions.】

item.title: 关税引发错位，全球白银市场面临压力
item.description: 由于贸易战的担忧令投资者不安，全球白银市场面临压力，关键指标闪烁红灯，数百万盎司的白银在交易中心之间流动，数月的混乱前景可期。【原文：The global silver market is under stress as trade-war concerns unsettle investors, with key indicators flashing red, millions of ounces on the move between trading hubs and months of disruption in prospect.】

item.title: 快速配送初创企业 Zapp 将在迪拜发布，进军拥挤的海湾市场
item.description: 英国快速递送初创公司 Zapp 计划最快于今年在迪拜推出新产品，进军日益拥挤的中东市场。【原文：Zapp, a British rapid-delivery startup, plans to launch in Dubai as soon as this year, entering an increasingly crowded market in the Middle East.】

item.title: 美国商业团体称越南面临美国新关税的 "真实 "风险
item.description: 美国-东盟商务理事会主席兼首席执行官特德-奥修斯（Ted Osius）在河内的一次吹风会上表示，特朗普政府可能会对越南商品征收新的关税，以此作为重新平衡美国与东南亚国家之间贸易的工具。【原文：The Trump administration could slap new tariffs on Vietnamese goods as a tool to rebalance trade between the US and the Southeast Asian Country, U.S.-Asean Business Council President and Chief Executive Officer Ted Osius said at a Hanoi briefing.】

item.title: 据说 Grab 正在推进收购竞争对手 GoTo 的谈判
item.description: 据熟悉内情的人士透露，Grab 控股有限公司正在推进收购 GoTo 集团的尝试，这家新加坡的乘车和外卖公司已经开始对其印尼竞争对手进行尽职调查。【原文：Grab Holdings Ltd. is moving forward with its attempt to take over GoTo Group, according to people familiar with the matter, who said the Singaporean ride and delivery firm has begun due diligence on its Indonesian rival.】

item.title: 保费增长使 Old Mutual 盈利创 2019 年以来新高
item.description: 受南非国内短期保险和财富管理产品需求上升的推动，老互惠集团（Old Mutual Group Ltd. ）公布了自 2019 年以来的最高利润。【原文：Old Mutual Group Ltd. reported its highest profit since 2019, buoyed by rising demand for its short-term insurance and wealth management products at home in South Africa.】

item.title: 不喜欢投票的人应该有投票权。只是不要那么频繁。
item.description:
英国的新规划制度将削弱民选地方官员的作用，从而阻碍发展并解决英国的住房短缺问题。【原文：

Britain’s new planning regime will pare back the role of elected local officials to unblock development and fix Britain’s housing shortage.

】

item.title: 德国立法者就具有里程碑意义的支出法案进行投票：看点
item.description: 德国立法者将于周二就一项法案进行投票，该法案将释放数千亿欧元的债务融资国防和基础设施支出，并预示着欧洲最大经济体将转向大幅扩张的财政政策。【原文：German lawmakers will vote on a bill Tuesday that would unlock hundreds of billions of euros in debt-financed defense and infrastructure spending and herald a pivot toward a substantially more expansive fiscal policy in Europe’s biggest economy.】

item.title: 中国在岸市场资金流入创新高，尽管贸易问题令人担忧
item.description: 由于 DeepSeek 的技术突破和对美国例外论的疑虑帮助抵消了贸易导致的对本地资产的担忧，外商对中国在岸市场的投资在 2 月份创下历史新高。【原文：Foreign investments into China’s onshore markets rose to a record high in February as DeepSeek’s technology breakthrough and doubts over US exceptionalism helped offset trade-led concern over local assets.】

item.title: 比亚迪的五分钟充电技术与竞争对手相比有何优势？
item.description: 中国汽车制造巨头比亚迪公司（BYD Co., Ltd.）正在将事情推向更高的高度，现在它宣称自己的系统将使电动汽车充电与汽油车加油一样快。【原文：Chinese automaking juggernaut BYD Co. is taking things to even greater heights, now staking claim to a system it says will make it as quick to charge an electric vehicle as to refuel a gasoline car.】

item.title: 印度监管机构批准 LG 电子上市计划
item.description: 印度市场监管机构批准了 LG 电子公司（LG Electronics Inc.【原文：India’s market regulator approved LG Electronics Inc.’s application for an initial public offering of its Indian unit, a deal that may raise $1.5 billion and be one of the biggest local listings this year.】

item.title: 经济困境引发印尼股市暴跌停牌
item.description: 由于担心经济疲软和开斋节假期前消费者支出疲软，印尼股市周二暴跌，引发交易停顿。【原文：Indonesian equities tumbled on Tuesday, triggering a trading halt, as concerns about a weakening economy and softer consumer spending ahead of the Eid holiday weighed on sentiment.】

item.title: 联邦银行首席执行官称澳大利亚可抵御贸易战风险
item.description: 澳大利亚最大的银行行长表示，尽管唐纳德-特朗普最近宣布的关税措施引发了全球股市的大幅下挫，但澳大利亚仍有能力抵御贸易战的风险。【原文：The chief of Australia’s biggest bank said the country is well placed to weather the risks of a trade war, even after Donald Trump’s whipsaw tariff announcements recently spurred a steep selloff in global equity markets.】

item.title: 高盛称日本工资需进一步提高才能实现日本央行目标
item.description: 高盛（Goldman Sachs）的经济学家认为，日本的工资在未来两年至少需要增长 3%，才能实现日本央行的可持续通胀目标。【原文：Japan’s wages need to rise by at least 3% over the next two years to achieve the Bank of Japan’s sustainable inflation target, according to economists at Goldman Sachs.】

item.title: 据称中国将审查李嘉诚的港口交易是否存在违规行为
item.description: 有迹象表明，中国政府对这家香港企业集团在美国压力下剥离巴拿马业务感到不满，熟悉内情的人士透露，中国政府已开始调查长江和记实业有限公司出售海外港口业务一事。【原文：Chinese authorities have begun looking into CK Hutchison Holdings Ltd.’s sale of its overseas port businesses, people familiar with the matter said, amid signs that Beijing is unhappy that the Hong Kong conglomerate divested its Panama operations under US pressure.】

item.title: 主要发货国天气持续恶劣，小麦涨幅扩大
item.description: 由于主要出口国的恶劣天气继续引发对全球供应可能受到打击的担忧，小麦在上一交易日触及一个月来的最高价后延续涨势。【原文：Wheat extended gains after touching the highest price in a month during the previous session, as bad weather in major exporters continues to spark concerns about a potential hit to global supplies.】

item.title: 香港领导人称李嘉诚出售港口引发社会关注
item.description: 李嘉诚计划将其公司的大部分全球港口业务出售给贝莱德公司（BlackRock Inc.【原文：Li Ka-shing’s plan to sell the bulk of his company’s global ports operations to a consortium led by BlackRock Inc. is causing concern, according to Hong Kong’s leader.】

item.title: Cognition AI 在朗斯代尔公司主导的交易中获得 40 亿美元估值
item.description: 据熟悉内情的人士透露，人工智能编码助手开发商 Cognition AI 公司已融资数亿美元，估值接近 40 亿美元。【原文：Cognition AI Inc., the developer of an artificial intelligence-powered coding assistant, has raised hundreds of millions of dollars at a valuation close to $4 billion, according to people familiar with the matter.】
